sec.title: Symbols and acronyms
sec.p: For the purpose of this document, the following symbols and acronyms apply.

td.p: Information technology for Learning Education and Training
Joint Technical Committee 1 “Information Technology” (of the ISO and IEC)
Organization for Economic Co-operation and Development
